value.stringValue: {"mentions":[],"message":"@{![Account].OwnerId} Hi there, please note that this school's closing date was 28 days ago and the necessary CLNE and/or LFC Access Relinquishment dates are not captured or reflected. Please have the records updated accordingly, as this causes a misalignment with reporting."}

{"mentions":[],"message":"Hi SalesForce Admins, please note that this school's closing date was 56 days ago and CM has been notified minimum of 3 times about the necessary CLNE and/or LFC Access Relinquishment dates not being captured or reflected. Please follow up with the relevant party and attempt at defining a resolution path"}

Hi SalesForce Admins, please note that this school's closing date was 56 days ago and CM has been notified minimum of 3 times about the necessary CLNE and/or LFC Access Relinquishment dates not being captured or reflected. Please follow up with the relevant party and attempt at defining a resolution path

Flow.description: Update Jack's name to proper tag (May2020) - School Closing date blank - Billing LFC Access Relinquished & Billing CLNE Removed Date captured and school migration status reflects 9-Connection Relinquished
